attributes.action: make front line Police Officers jobs exempt from cuts
attributes.additional_details: The recent lawlessness and civil unrest that has hit the streets of the UK has proved that the current numbers of serving front line police officers is woefully inadequate and certainly not up to the task of protecting the home owners and shopkeeper who’s lives have been ruined by the mobs who ran amok on our streets with impunity. The government need to abolish the proposed cuts to front line services and even reverse this policy putting extra officers on the streets.
